entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with wet snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
